package.name: digital_twin_integrator
package.description: A digital twin integrator node. It interacts with digital twins to get data that come from the perception pipeline, such as numerical poses of objects in the scene, the robot configuration, etc., and enrich assertion statements in an ontology (ABoxes) with those data.
package.author: Léon JUBIN-HUERNE
Raphaël LALLEMENT
Matteo MORELLI
